ğŸš€ If you've always dreamed of being an airline pilot, you'll love the new additions to the marketplace. There are three packages available, letting you simulate the life of an A320 or B747 pilot with United, ITA, or Iberia. If exploring the US excites you, the US Atlantic package lets you fly a few hundred nautical miles and enjoy the beautiful scenery. For those who crave a challenge, the advanced challenges - Japan Landings - offer an exciting test of your landing skills.
